column4: Why does the package installer return "ERROR: Wrong architecture 'i386'" when I attempt to install "install_flash_player_10_linux.deb"?
do you use the 64-bit version of ubuntu?
that package was made for the 32-bit version of ubuntu
you'll have to download the 64-bit .tar.gz and install the libflashplugin.so file in it to firefox's plugin directories
